DataElement.preferredDefinition: A sequence of characters used to link multiple respiratory system findings to a single finding.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Respiratory Domain Respiratory System Link Group
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A findings domain that contains physiological and morphological findings related to the respiratory system, including the organs that are involved in breathing such as the nose, throat, larynx, trachea, bronchi and lungs._A sequence of characters used to link multiple respiratory system findings to a single finding.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A findings domain that contains physiological and morphological findings related to the respiratory system, including the organs that are involved in breathing such as the nose, throat, larynx, trachea, bronchi and lungs.

Concepts.definition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to the respiratory system.
